verses.roman:
sahajei mora tāhāṅ yāite mana haya
prabhu-ājñā lañā deha', kariye vinaya"

synonyms: sahejei—naturally; mora—my; tāhāṅ—there; yāite—to go; mana—mind; haya—is; prabhu-ājñā—permission from Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā deha'-kindly get; kariye vinaya—humbly requesting.
translation: "Naturally I have a desire to go to Vṛndāvana; therefore please humbly request Him to grant His permission."
